name: Stone of Influence
effectDescription: You may decide the game ends when a player has not all 8, but only7 shop spaces filled.

name: Shield of Safety
effectDescription: You are allowed to reorganise the potions in your shop and change their positions once per round.

name: Helmet of Preservation
effectDescription: The 2 spaces in your shop directly under the 2 display case spaces, are also display cases spaces now.

name: Belt of Thievery
effectDescription: When playing a Thief potion, you are allowed to steal an active potioncard. You can place it directly in your shop as normal. And your rival does not get to use it’s effect.

name: Statue of Wisdom
effectDescription: You receive 2 extra points if you finish the game with all 8 shop spaces filled.

name: Necklace of Trades
effectDescription: When producing a potion in phase 3, you can trade 2 different ingredients for an ingredient of choice (instead of 3 ingredients).

name: Dagger of Light
effectDescription: Simple potions are always protected from Thiefpotion and Thief Nectar.

name: Boots of Forthsight
effectDescription: In phase 1, instead of 2, take 3 simple potion cards. Pick which ones you want to keep and discard the other.

name: Production Liqueur
effectDescription: To be used in phase 3 instead of phase 4. Gives you 3 extra ingredients in phase 3 when you produce a potion or magic item.

name: Production Liqueur
effectDescription: To be used in phase 3 instead of phase 4. Gives you 3 extra ingredients in phase 3 when you produce a potion or magic item.

name: Golden Water
effectDescription: To be used in phase 3 instead of phase 4. Gives you 3 extra gold coins in phase 3 when you buy a potion or magic item.

name: Golden Water
effectDescription: To be used in phase 3 instead of phase 4. Gives you 3 extra gold coins in phase 3 when you buy a potion or magic item.

name: Spy Oil
effectDescription: Choose a rival and view all cards in this players book of knowledge. Pick 2 of the potion cards (max 1 advanced)  and place them in your own book of knowledge. Your rival may use a Guardian Elixer. If so, you are not allowed to pick two cards, or even see the cards in the book of knowledge (depending on when the Guardian Elixer is played). In this case however, you get to draw a new simple potion card and a new advanced potion card from the deck and place them in you book of knowledge.

name: Spy Oil
effectDescription: Choose a rival and view all cards in this players book of knowledge. Pick 2 of the potion cards (max 1 advanced)  and place them in your own book of knowledge. Your rival may use a Guardian Elixer. If so, you are not allowed to pick two cards, or even see the cards in the book of knowledge (depending on when the Guardian Elixer is played). In this case however, you get to draw a new simple potion card and a new advanced potion card from the deck and place them in you book of knowledge.

name: Thief Nectar
effectDescription: Steal a simple or advanced potion from a rival’s shop and add it to your own shop. Your rival may use a Guardian Elixer. If so, you are not allowed to steal a potion. In this case however, you get to draw a new advanced potion card from the deck and place it directly in your shop.

name: Thief Nectar
effectDescription: Steal a simple or advanced potion from a rival’s shop and add it to your own shop. Your rival may use a Guardian Elixer. If so, you are not allowed to steal a potion. In this case however, you get to draw a new advanced potion card from the deck and place it directly in your shop.

name: Guardian Elixer
effectDescription: Protects you against all Spy or Thief potions. Can be used straight from your shop when you are attacked. You can play it immediately, or wait untill your rival tells you what card he wants to steal or take and decide then.

name: Guardian Elixer
effectDescription: Protects you against all Spy or Thief potions. Can be used straight from your shop when you are attacked. You can play it immediately, or wait untill your rival tells you what card he wants to steal or take and decide then.

name: Muliply Juice
effectDescription: To be used in phase 1 of the next round, instead of phase 4. In phase 1 of the next round, you may draw three times the amount of potion cards you normaly draw. Or chose 2 item cards.

name: Muliply Juice
effectDescription: To be used in phase 1 of the next round, instead of phase 4. In phase 1 of the next round, you may draw three times the amount of potion cards you normaly draw. Or chose 2 item cards.

name: Sorcery Tonic
effectDescription: Take the deck of item cards and shuffle it. Put it in front of you and draw the card on top. Add the card directly to your shop.

name: Sorcery Tonic
effectDescription: Take the deck of item cards and shuffle it. Put it in front of you and draw the card on top. Add the card directly to your shop.

name: Wisdom Wine
effectDescription: Choose 1 item card and draw 4 advanced potion cards. Put all 5 cards in your book of knowledge.

name: Wisdom Wine
effectDescription: Choose 1 item card and draw 4 advanced potion cards. Put all 5 cards in your book of knowledge.

name: Productionpotion
effectDescription: To be used in phase 3 instead of phase 4. Gives you 2 extra ingredients in phase 3 when you produce a potion or magic item. So when producing potions that need 1 or 2 ingredients, you don’t need to hand in any other cards.

name: Productionpotion
effectDescription: To be used in phase 3 instead of phase 4. Gives you 2 extra ingredients in phase 3 when you produce a potion or magic item. So when producing potions that need 1 or 2 ingredients, you don’t need to hand in any other cards.

name: Goldpotion
effectDescription: To be used in phase 3 instead of phase 4. Gives you 2 extra gold coins in phase 3 when you buy a potion or magic item. So when buying potions that cost 1 or 2 gold coins, you don’t need to hand in any other cards.

name: Goldpotion
effectDescription: To be used in phase 3 instead of phase 4. Gives you 2 extra gold coins in phase 3 when you buy a potion or magic item. So when buying potions that cost 1 or 2 gold coins, you don’t need to hand in any other cards.

name: Spypotion
effectDescription: Choose a rival and view all cards in this players book of knowledge. Pick 1 of the simple potion cards and place it in your own book of knowledge. Your rival may use a guardian potion or Guardian Elixer. If so, you are not allowed to pick a card, or even see the cards in the book of knowledge (depending on when the Guardianpotion or -Elixer is played). In this case however, you get to draw a new simple potion card from the deck and place it in you book of knowledge.

name: Spypotion
effectDescription: Choose a rival and view all cards in this players book of knowledge. Pick 1 of the simple potion cards and place it in your own book of knowledge. Your rival may use a guardian potion or Guardian Elixer. If so, you are not allowed to pick a card, or even see the cards in the book of knowledge (depending on when the Guardianpotion or -Elixer is played). In this case however, you get to draw a new simple potion card from the deck and place it in you book of knowledge.

name: Thiefpotion
effectDescription: Steal a simple potion from a rival's shop and add it to your own shop. Your rival may use a guardian potion or Guardian Elixer. If so, you are not allowed to steal a potion. In this case however, you get to draw a new simple potion card from the deck and place it directly in your shop.

name: Thiefpotion
effectDescription: Steal a simple potion from a rival's shop and add it to your own shop. Your rival may use a guardian potion or Guardian Elixer. If so, you are not allowed to steal a potion. In this case however, you get to draw a new simple potion card from the deck and place it directly in your shop.

name: Guardianpotion
effectDescription: Protects you against Spypotion or Thiefpotion. This potion never has to be made active in phase 2. Can be used straight from your shop when you are attacked. You can play it immediately, or wait untill your rival tells you what card he want’s to steal or take.

name: Guardianpotion
effectDescription: Protects you against Spypotion or Thiefpotion. This potion never has to be made active in phase 2. Can be used straight from your shop when you are attacked. You can play it immediately, or wait untill your rival tells you what card he want’s to steal or take.

name: Refreshpotion
effectDescription: Put all potion cards currently in your book of knowledge aside. Draw the same number of simple and advanced potioncards from the decks and put them in your book of knowledge. Then draw 2 more simple potioncards and put them in your book as well. Discard all the potioncards you put aside.

name: Refreshpotion
effectDescription: Put all potion cards currently in your book of knowledge aside. Draw the same number of simple and advanced potioncards from the decks and put them in your book of knowledge. Then draw 2 more simple potioncards and put them in your book as well. Discard all the potioncards you put aside.

name: Supplypotion
effectDescription: Immediately draw 5 simple potioncards and put the in your book of knowledge.

name: Supplypotion
effectDescription: Immediately draw 5 simple potioncards and put the in your book of knowledge.

name: Knowledgepotion
effectDescription: Draw 2 advanced potioncards and put the in your book of knowledge. Also if you have less than 3 potions in your shop.

name: Knowledgepotion
effectDescription: Draw 2 advanced potioncards and put the in your book of knowledge. Also if you have less than 3 potions in your shop.

name: Doublepotion
effectDescription: Draw 2 simple potioncards from the deck and add them directly to your shop. When you draw a new Doublepotion, discard it and draw another simple potioncard.

name: Doublepotion
effectDescription: Draw 2 simple potioncards from the deck and add them directly to your shop. When you draw a new Doublepotion, discard it and draw another simple potioncard.

name: Timepotion
effectDescription: To be used at the end of the round, instead of phase 4. Immediately after this round ends, you get an extra round. So all 4 phases. If more players use Timepotion in the same round, they play in turns like in a normal round.

name: Timepotion
effectDescription: To be used at the end of the round, instead of phase 4. Immediately after this round ends, you get an extra round. So all 4 phases. If more players use Timepotion in the same round, they play in turns like in a normal round.
